summary: Adds Incredible Hulk as a follower outside Riverwood with a spare set of armor.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a unique follower to Skyrim, based on the Marvel character, Bruce Banner, The Incredible Hulk, The Monster, The Green Giant!

This is for Male Only.

You'll find him outside Riverwood. He will level with the player and is a warrior but should just use his fists and has his own perks.

Furthermore, it adds an second set of armor.

***************************************************
The Armour:
Based around the Iron armour retextured with the Silver, and blue scheme of Hulk. It's unenchanted, and can only be crafted under the Iron section of the Sky Forge, and tempered as usual at the workbench. Stat-wise it's a little stronger than Iron Armour.
Note the set is standalone, and not a replacer of the Iron armour. Although it's based on the iconic Hulk pants of Marvel, i've attempted to make it look more armor based, more in keeping with Skyrim. It's about as lore-friendly as you can get.

**************************************************
Compatibility & Troubleshooting

The armour should not conflict with anything else.
**************************************************
Installation:
Simply extract the archive into the Skyrim folder, so the .esp, textures folder, and meshes folder all land into your skyrim/data directory.
Typically:
C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim

C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim
author: wanoo99
